## Type of Change

Please check the relevant options:

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)

- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Infrastructure change (Terraform, Kubernetes, CI/CD)
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Test addition or update

## Checklist

Before submitting this PR, please ensure:

- [ ] Code follows the style guidelines (Google Java Style, PEP 8, terraform fmt)
- [ ] Self-reviewed my own code
- [ ] Commented code in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] Added/updated documentation
- [ ] Added/updated tests that prove the fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] No new warnings or errors introduced
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] Database migrations included (if applicable)
- [ ] Environment variables documented (if applicable)
